attributes.additional_details:
As stated below by they Ofs must recognise that level of teaching and support is not the same and lower 20/21 fee limit.

“The Office for Students (OfS), the regulator in England, has committed to protecting students throughout the present crisis and has published guidance for registered providers on how it will approach the regulation of quality and standards, and this includes practical ways in which students can complete their studies whilst ensuring quality and standards are upheld.”
attributes.background: The government must step in and have the official bodies for regulating Ofs to evaluate the poor level of learning in university. University students lack of support is mounting and the Ofs must now lower the fee amount universities can charge for 2020/2021.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
